description: Simple peanut butter cookies for every occasion.
keywords: Cookie,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare baking tray with baking paper. Preheat oven to 175Â°C
Add peanut butter and sugar to bowl. Add egg and mix well until combined
Roll into small balls and add place on baking tray. Press down lightly with a fork.
Place in oven for approx 7 mins - don't overtake. Cookies should be soft.
